text: Hi everyone. I was wondering if anyone could help me out with a webhook related question for an integration to HubSpot? Really been stuck for days now and just need some help.

Hello, I'm encountering this error where accessing a company created from another account (like updating a company's info) via Api returns the error of
```{
    "status": "error",
    "message": "resource not found",
    "correlationId": "4bdc20dd-2a1c-4b97-aee4-ec56ff6220cd"
}```
please is there a way to achieve the aforementioned without encountering this error?

thank you
We have a project and it requires an ecommerce and online community feature and it must be on HubSpot platform (CMS, etc). Does HubSpot support these following features?

This error says that on the account you are pointing to with your request there is no company with provided id, if the company is placed on another account just authenticate to that account in your request (e.g. through Private App Access Token)

I’m having trouble getting a minified css file to update. It’s showing old styles. I tried implementing <https://github.com/GonzaloTorreras/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/wiki/So-you're-having-HubSpot-Caching-Issues%3F|this browser extension> as well, but no luck. Any other tips or tricks for getting the HubSpot cache to clear or to get the minified CSS files to regenerate?
That code should work, are you sure your video column is named video?

Hi, everyone.
I'm having trouble getting field data in one custom module from different custom module?
Anyone can help me here?
